PAUSEICON.path_hint: Folder and filename of where your alternative pause icon is within the Foundry VTT data. Click the picker button to select your icon. Type None, for no image.
PAUSEICON.opacity_hint: Value between 0 and 100, lower means more translucent
PAUSEICON.dimensions_hint: Width and Height of the icon in pixels.
PAUSEICON.speed_hint: Seconds per rotation, 0 is no rotation.
PAUSEICON.icon_vertical_hint: Number of pixels to move the icon. Negative values mores the picture up, positive moves it down
PAUSEICON.fontSize_hint: Size of the font in em, default is 2
PAUSEICON.shadow_hint: When enabled there is a drop shadow under the text.
PAUSEICON.textColor_hint: Either Hexcode (eg. #EEEEEE) or HTML color name (eg. CornflowerBlue)
PAUSEICON.fontFamily_hint: Font name to be used. It works well with Custom Fonts module. Check the name is well written.
